featured.text: The industry leader, NBC, however, attracts 11 percent of viewers.
With such support, spiritual leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei vowed, “We will rebuild Bam stronger than before.” 45.
The team complained that its leader always took the ______ for all the hard work done by the team members.
“You forget a political leader, but you won’t forget a robot.” 41.

other.text: The reincarnated leaders were always “discovered” in the households of lowly families __(20)__ noble ones.
They have complex interactions led by a leader.
To reach the goal of making her company a market leader, Michelle _____ a plan to open ten new stores around the country this year.
“It is great to see leaders in the fashion industry recognizing that the animals need their fur more than we do.” 49.

definition.zh_def: 領導者，指在團體或組織中負責指導和管理的人。
definition.en_def: A person who leads or commands a group, organization, or country.
definition.example: The leader of the team inspired everyone to work harder.
